import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import DashboardRedact from './DashboardRedact' import '../Styles/PersonalAccount.css' const Dashboard = () => { const { user, orders } = useAuth() const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false) // Removed useEffect that auto-closed editing to allow manual control of isEditing state if (!user) { return } const renderValue = (value) => { if (!value || value === 'Не заполнено') { return не указан } return value } const formatFullName = () => { const lastName = user?.last_name || '' const firstName = user?.first_name || '' const middleName = user?.middle_name || '' const fullName = `${lastName} ${firstName} ${middleName}`.trim() return fullName || 'Не заполнено' } const handleSettingsClick = () => { console.log('handleSettingsClick called') setIsEditing(true) } const handleCancelEdit = () => { console.log('handleCancelEdit called') setIsEditing(false) } if (isEditing) { console.log('Rendering DashboardRedact') return } return (
  • Уведомления
